actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1977A of the Revised Statutes to modify the remedies available to victims of intentional employment discrimination, and for other purposes.
short_title: Employee Equity and Job Preservation Act of 1991
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Employee Equity and Job Preservation Act of 1991 - Amends Federal law relating to damages in cases of intentional employment discrimination to revise provisions limiting the dollar amount of damages awarded for pecuniary and nonpecuniary losses and punitive damages.

titles.title: Employee Equity and Job Preservation Act of 1991
A bill to amend section 1977A of the Revised Statutes to modify the remedies available to victims of intentional employment discrimination, and for other purposes.
